title: 10 Chic Ways to Wear a Saree Straight From the Style Stars of Instagram
text:
Trends are always fun to work into your wardrobe, but nothing you'll find at Forever 21 could beat the intricate beauty and cultural art of the saree. Whether you throw a belt on it, opt for a mermaid wrap, or pair it up with a sleek trouser, there are endless ways to add a dose of your personal style to the traditional garb.

Ankita Bhardwaj, a 25-year-old influencer from Toronto, Canada is an expert at styling sarees. Her stunning looks have built her an Instagram empire, which currently boasts 173k followers. She chatted with Seventeen about her favorite saree styling tricks and tips. She says that wearing sarees (especially ones handed down from her mother and grandmother) makes her feel more connected to her family heritage.

"For me, as a first generation Indo-Canadian, it’s a way to connect back to my Indian roots. I feel empowered and proud to embrace where I come from and who I am, especially when I get to represent a culture so beautiful," Ankita explained. "We need more love and acceptance and in many ways, it can start with fashion. In my life at least, it all started with a saree and my story."

Ahead, get your fill of saree outfit inspiration from the best style stars on the internet. Reference this list the next time you need to get dressed.
